channel.title: One click read clue scroll
channel.description: how would I format a code that lets it be that when I click read clue scroll it opens the clue scroll interface?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 10:08:41 PM[/size][hr].[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 11:22:13 PM[/size][hr].[br][size=1]Posted at: November 11, 2006, 11:44:07 PM[/size][hr].

item.title: One click read clue scroll
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

thanks but I already have everything else done… I just want to know if there is a way of opening up a clue scroll interface with only a clue scroll if not the okay I guess I’ll just make an item usewith

Read full topic

item.title: One click read clue scroll
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

here::

/CLUE VOIDS AND OTHER STUFF/
// CLUE_00
public static int clue[] = {1,2,3,4,5};

public static int randomClue()
{
return clue[(int)(Math.random()*clue.length)];
}

/public void additemtoclue(int itemID, int slot, int amount)
{
sendQuest("@dre@Clue Scroll", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@Congratz, you have completed the treasure trail!", 8145);
outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34);
outStream.writeWord(8134); // shops
outStream.writeByte(slot); // slot
outStream.writeWord(itemID); // item
outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord();
}/
